title: Funnydruids
author: Funnydruids
content: a little place of cunts and bitches that trading 10USD a day and think they are so special... i never seen a more sadder place with bunch of cunts and losers... jesus....Remove my account admin... Gonna go out and laugh at you all.. WHORES!

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Funnydruids on October 25, 2022, 01:36:20 PMWHORES!You are angry. Find yourself a better place if the environment does not suit you.QuoteRemove my account admin... Gonna go out and laugh at you all..There are no self exclusion and even admin does not remove an account. You can delete all the posts you made manually, remove contents from the threads you posted and lose the email and password.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Quote from: Funnydruids on October 25, 2022, 01:36:20 PM...Looks like someone is off their meds again Ignore button activated
